TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionConsumerAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 标识作为 Web 部件连接中的使用者的服务器控件中的回调方法，开发人员可用来指定有关使用者的连接点的详细信息。

span.span: Identifies the callback method in a server control acting as the consumer in a Web Parts connection, and enables developers to specify details about the consumer's connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件连接中包含两个服务器控件位于区域和通过接口实例共享的数据从一个控件传递到其他。A Web Parts connection consists of two server controls residing in a zone and sharing data by means of an interface instance passed from one control to the other. 提供该接口实例的控件称为提供程序，而接收的接口实例和进程或显示的数据的控件称为使用者。The control that serves the interface instance is called the provider, and the control that receives the interface instance and processes or displays the data is called the consumer. 有关连接的详细信息，请参阅类和[Web 部件连接概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)。For details on connections, see the class and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b). 在连接中的使用者控件可以是控件或任何类型的服务器或用户控件，但它必须具有指定为回调方法的方法。The consumer control in a connection can be a control or any type of server or user control, but it must have a method designated as a callback method. 在连接过程中，调用回调方法和它的用途是从提供程序接收一个包含数据的接口实例。The callback method is invoked during the connection process, and its purpose is to receive from the provider an interface instance that contains data. 若要指定可作为使用者中的回调方法的方法，必须添加`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`方法的元数据元素 (元素基于类)。To designate the method that serves as the callback method in a consumer, you must add a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to the method (the element is based on the class). 除了指定回调方法中使用者，对象还可以指定某些详细信息的使用者连接点。In addition to designating the callback method in a consumer, the object also enables you to specify certain details about a consumer's connection point. 使用者连接点是的一个实例封装有关使用者建立连接，包括使用者的控件类型，是否在相同时，它可以连接到多个提供程序所需的所有详细信息的类什么接口使用者的类型可以接收来自提供程序，回调方法和表示用户界面 (UI) 中的使用者连接点的显示名称的详细信息。A consumer connection point is an instance of the class that encapsulates all the details about a consumer needed to establish a connection, including the consumer's control type, whether it can connect to multiple providers at the same time, what type of interface the consumer can receive from a provider, details about the callback method, and a display name that represents the consumer connection point in the user interface (UI). 每个 Web 部件连接包括与使用者控件关联的使用者连接点。Every Web Parts connection includes a consumer connection point that is associated with the consumer control. 当您将添加`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`到使用者中的回调方法的元数据元素，还可用它来指定有关使用者连接点的以下详细信息： 连接点的显示名称 (有关详细信息，请参阅属性)，是否使用者可以连接到多个提供程序在同一时间 (有关详细信息，请参阅属性)，连接点的 ID (有关详细信息，请参阅属性)，和使用者 （适用于使用的连接点类型详细信息，请参阅属性)。When you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to the callback method in a consumer, you can also use it to specify the following details about the consumer connection point: a display name for the connection point (for details, see the property), whether the consumer can connect to multiple providers at the same time (for details, see the property), an ID for the connection point (for details, see the property), and the type of the connection point that the consumer uses (for details, see the property). 构造函数的四个重载类每个具有参数，可用于创建类的新实例时指定的一个或多个连接点属性的值。The four overloads of the constructor for the class each have parameters that allow you to specify values for one or more of these connection point properties when a new instance of the class is created. 此外可以以编程方式; 设置为使用者连接点属性中的大多数将它们设置使用`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`元素是可选的。Most of the properties for a consumer connection point can also be set programmatically; setting them using the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` element is optional. > [!NOTE] > 当您将添加`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`到回调方法，使用者中的元数据元素，您始终必须指定唯一必需的参数是`displayName`参数 (有关详细信息，请参阅构造函数重载)。When you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to a callback method in a consumer, the only required parameter that you must always specify is the `displayName` parameter (for details, see the constructor overload). 此参数的值分配给属性，并且当用户在打开连接用户界面 (由创建控件)，显示名称表示在 UI 中的使用者连接点。The value of this parameter is assigned to the property, and when a user opens the connection UI (created by the control), the display name represents the consumer connection point in the UI. 如果指定使用者控件中的多个回调方法，将拥有多个可能的连接点可供选择，并且添加时`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`元数据元素中的每个回调方法，你还应指定的值`id`参数，以使每个使用者连接点有一个已知的唯一标识符。If you designate multiple callback methods in a consumer control, you will have multiple possible connection points to choose from, and when you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to each callback method, you should also specify a value for the `id` parameter, so that each consumer connection point has a known, unique identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用类，通过演示如何声明`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`使用者控件中的回调方法的元数据元素。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单的重载;仅`displayName`提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的两个 Web 部件控件之间的基本、 静态连接类。The following code examples demonstrate how to create a basic, static connection between two Web Parts controls using the class. 提供程序和使用者代码文件应置于 App_Code 文件夹下包含.aspx 页的应用程序文件夹。The provider and consumer code files should be put into the App_Code folder under the application folder that contains the .aspx page. 第一个示例演示作为提供者的类。The first example shows a class acting as a provider. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#1)] 第二个示例演示作为使用者的类。The second example shows a class acting as a consumer. 请注意，一种方法指定为与该回调方法`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`元数据元素。Notice that a method is designated as the callback method with the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 最后一个示例显示了包含两个控件的 ASP.NET 页。The final example shows the ASP.NET page that contains the two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/defaultvb.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定一个值用作连接点显示名称，还可以选择指定一些值用作连接点的 ID 和/或连接点类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a value to use for the connection point display name, and optionally specifying values to use for the connection point's ID, the connection point type, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者控件可以有多个方法标记为`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`元数据元素。A consumer control can have multiple methods marked with the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element. 在这种情况下，使用者将具有多个连接点和每个实例`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`元素应指定关联的连接点的唯一 ID 值，以便可以区分使用者的连接点。In this case, the consumer would have multiple connection points, and each instance of the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` element should specify a unique ID value for the associated connection point, so that the consumer's connection points can be distinguished.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName) cil managed

param.name: displayName
param.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含使用者连接点在用户界面 (UI) 中显示的友好名称。

span.span: A string that contains a friendly name for the consumer connection point to display in the user interface (UI).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，为使用者连接点指定显示名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建与充当使用者的 Web 部件控件的方法一起使用的属性的实例。This constructor creates an instance of the attribute that is used with a method of a Web Parts control acting as a consumer. 此方法将成为该提供程序和使用者之间的连接点。This method becomes the connection point between the provider and the consumer. 通常情况下，使用此构造函数的方法是声明`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`你想要将指定为使用者控件中的回调方法的方法上的元数据元素。Typically, the way you use this constructor is to declare a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a method that you want to designate as a callback method in a consumer control. `displayName`参数是由使用者连接点的友好名称控件来表示在 UI 中的使用者连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用类，通过演示如何声明`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`使用者控件中的回调方法的元数据元素。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单的重载;仅`displayName`提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 若要运行的代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，为使用者连接点指定显示名称和 ID。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name and an ID for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是由使用者连接点的友好名称控件来表示在 UI 中的使用者连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `id`参数用于指定与特定的回调方法相关联的使用者连接点的 ID。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the consumer connection point associated with the specific callback method. 控件可以有多个连接点，但`id`每个必须是唯一的。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，此重载构造函数是在使用者控件中有多个回调方法的情况下很有用。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your consumer control.

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是由使用者连接点的友好名称控件来表示在 UI 中的使用者连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `connectionPointType`参数必须是派生自。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定此参数，则用于创建而不是标准的连接点Web 部件控件集提供的类。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是由使用者连接点的友好名称控件来表示在 UI 中的使用者连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `id`参数用于指定与特定的回调方法相关联的使用者连接点的 ID。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the consumer connection point associated with the specific callback method. 控件可以有多个连接点，但`id`每个必须是唯一的。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，此重载构造函数是在使用者控件中有多个回调方法的情况下很有用。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your consumer control. `connectionPointType`参数必须是派生自。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定此参数，则用于创建而不是标准的连接点Web 部件控件集提供的类。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsMultipleConnections { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示连接点是否允许多个连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the connection point allows multiple connections.

value.span: 如果连接点接受多个连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection point accepts multiple connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用者连接不接受多个连接，因此此属性设置为`false`。By default, consumer connections do not accept multiple connections, so this property is set to `false`. 提供程序的连接，但是，接受默认情况下，多个连接和此属性上对象设置为`true`。Provider connections, however, do accept multiple connections by default, and this property on a object is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionPointType As Type
public: property Type ^ ConnectionPointType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取使用者连接点的连接点类型。

span.span: Gets the connection point type of the consumer connection point.
A that indicates the type of the connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的使用者连接点。This property returns the of the consumer connection point. 必须派生自，并当声明`connectionPointType`参数与`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`的回调方法，您声明的类型的实例上的元数据元素用于创建连接点而不是标准类。The must derive from , and when you declare the `connectionPointType` parameter with a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method, an instance of the type you declare is used to create a connection point instead of the standard class.

exception.span: 使用的连接点类型（不是从 类派生的）无效。

span.span: An invalid connection point type (one that does not derive from the class) was used.

public: virtual property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取使用者连接点的友好名称。

span.span: Gets the friendly name of the consumer connection point.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含使用者连接点的友好显示名称。

span.span: A string containing a friendly display name for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是使用者连接点的友好名称。This property is the friendly name of a consumer connection point. 其值可以以声明方式，设置，当您将添加`displayName`参数`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`的回调方法的元数据元素。Its value can be set declaratively, when you add the `displayName` parameter to a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method. 它也可以设置以编程方式通过派生类中，通过使用受保护属性。It can also be set programmatically by a derived class, by using the protected property. 如果要搜索连接点集合，则应使用属性，因为 ID 属性必须是唯一的但属性不需要。When you are searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property, because the ID property must be unique, but the property need not be. 向用户显示的使用者连接点的属性时控件是在页上，连接用户界面 (UI) 处于打开状态，和用户能够选择要建立的连接点的视图中连接。The property of a consumer connection point is displayed to users when a control is on the page, the connection user interface (UI) is open, and the users are in a view where they are allowed to select connection points to establish a connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性，通过演示如何声明`ConnectionConsumerAttribute`使用者控件中的回调方法的元数据元素。The following code example demonstrates using the property, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单的重载;仅`displayName`提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 参数的值将成为的值属性。The value of the parameter will become the value of the property. 若要运行的代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用作 属性值的字符串，用于本地化方案中。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used as the value of the property, for use in localization scenarios.

value.span: 用作 的值的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此额外属性存在，以便可以从派生并提供本地化的版本。This extra property exists so that you can derive from and provide a localized version. 派生可本地化属性将保持私有的布尔字段以指示是否已本地化。The derived localizable attribute will maintain a private Boolean field to indicate whether it has been localized. 第一次访问属性，查询将查找本地化的字符串，再使用要分配到的本地化的值属性属性。On the first access to the property, it will look up the localized string, and then use the property to assign the localized value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串表示使用者连接点的唯一标识。

span.span: Gets a string that represents the unique identity of the consumer connection point.

value.span: 指定给使用者连接点的唯一 ID。

span.span: The unique ID assigned to the consumer connection point.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果搜索连接点集合，则应使用属性来查找特定的连接点。If searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property to locate a particular connection point. 此属性可用于区分具有相同名称的两个连接点。This property can be used to distinguish between two connection points of the same name. 使用者连接点可以具有相同属性值，但属性不能相同。Consumer connection points can have the same property value, but the property must be different.
